post.author: snake85027
post.body: I just have a big question, I dont really know what I did but everytime that i make a 3d sphere in zbrush 2 and then preview it HALF of the model is there, i just dont get it. Can anyone help me out.

post.author: JBIGBOOTSY
post.body: the first sphere you make with the Zsphere tool ends up being invisible, I have found that covering the inital sphere dose the trick.

post.author: modern
post.body:
JBIGBOOTSY wrote:
the first sphere you make with the Zsphere tool ends up being invisible, I have found that covering the inital sphere dose the trick.


Yeah, I've puzzled over zspheres as well. I think zspheres only work well when you string a few together. When I say a few i mean be quite generous. When I used too few zspheres I found my meshes became twisted and distorted. I think using more spheres subdivides the mesh to a greater extent.
